title: 3 and Out - Ballard's Belief System, Big Ben Boot Camp, Richard Sherman Arrest, NFL Headlines, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Ballard's Belief System, Big Ben Boot Camp, Richard Sherman Arrest, NFL Headlines, Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why Colts GM Chris Ballard made the right call not to chase Julio Jones, why Big Ben is reportedly finally getting into shape, and reacts to the Richard Sherman arrest and other NFL headlines. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
